item.description:
http://www.pecha-kuch...

Announcing the 6th Pecha Kucha night in Providence!

The theme is: civil soil.

Pecha Kucha is a monthly format for sharing ideas, in which presenters are allotted 20 slides and 20 seconds per slide. Put simply: 6 minutes and 40 seconds of adult-style show & tell. It began in Tokyo in 2003, has since spread to 218 cities worldwide, and it recently landed in Providence. ***Doors open at 19:20, presentations start at 20:20, and shmoozing goes down throughout.***

The organizer of this event has mentioned in her invite that the group will be migrating to an electronica dance party somewhere afterwards.
item.how_to_find_us: Event is upstairs. Please take a look at my picture if we haven't met.
item.name: PechaKucha Phenomenon in Providence
